description: Mireille is a Wavemaster who uses the same avatar as Mistral and loves of treasure-hunting. She is a good friend and ally of Rena and Shugo and is knowledgeable of The World. Her true identity is Mirei Kurokawa, the daughter of Mayumi Kurokawa, who was originally the Wavemaster Mistral and gave the avatar to her daughter.
name: Mireille
